name: Prana Becksa 7/8 Leggings - Women's
description:
Comfort meets performance, with features that add a little ease to your workout. Moisture-wicking recycled polyester with a high waist to keeps you covered during vinyasas or deadlifts. Flatlock seams keep your workouts chafe-free.Lightweight recycled polyester blend wicks moisture to keep you dry and comfortable.High-rise, wide elastic waistband adds coverage.1x1 stretch knit offers light compression.Jeans-style side pockets.Flatlock seams throughout eliminate chafing.

        Sustainability
